plurals.name: app_warning_before_installation_dialog__installation_question
plurals.item:
%1$s has the following problem:

%2$s

Do you still want to install %1$s?

%1$s has the following problems:

%2$s

Do you still want to install %1$s?

resources.string: Please report this error. Click to view the error report.

Privately browse the internet, for free! The Brave Private Browser App is your fast, free, and safe private web browser with ad blocker and pop-up blocker. Privately browse and search the internet without being tracked by advertisers, malware and pop-ups.

- Brave uses the technical foundation of Google Chrome and thus indirectly supports the monopoly position of the Chromium render engine.\n- Due to its Basic Attention Token BAT on the Ethereum blockchain the project has ties with cryptocurrency. Blockchains have many problems and should be avoided in my view.
Welcome to Brave Beta for Android!\nTry out the newest features and give early feedback: https://brave.com/msupport\nYou can install Brave Beta alongside your current version of Brave for Android.

Welcome to Brave Nightly (Developer) for Android!\nTry out the newest features and give early feedback: https://brave.com/msupport\nYou can install Brave Nightly alongside your current version of Brave for Android.

Bromite aims at providing a no-clutter browsing experience without privacy-invasive features and with the addition of a fast ad-blocking engine. Minimal UI changes are applied to help curbing the idea of "browser as an advertisement platform".
- Bromite uses the technical foundation of Google Chrome and thus indirectly supports the monopoly position of the Chromium render engine.
The SystemWebView package contains the core browser/rendering engine of Bromite and its same features. It offers the possibility to replace the default browser component for the whole Android system.
The following error occurred during download. If this error occurs frequently, feel free to submit the crash report to notabug.org, GitHub or GitLab.
This error occurred when the download metadata was fetched. If this error occurs frequently, feel free to submit the crash report to notabug.org, GitHub or GitLab.
This error occurred during installation. If this error occurs frequently, feel free to submit the crash report to notabug.org, GitHub or GitLab.
This error occurred when checking for updates in the main view. If this error occurs frequently, feel free to submit the crash report to notabug.org, GitHub or GitLab.
Unfortunately, FFUpdater crashed last time and logged this error. Please submit the crash report to notabug.org, GitHub or GitLab.
The application requires Android %1$s. But your device is only running Android %2$s. Either choose a different app, update your operating system or switch to a newer smartphone.
Shows when update downloads in the background fail.
Notification about download errors in the background
The background download of the %1$s update failed. If this error occurs frequently, feel free to report it on notabug.org, GitHub or GitLab.
The background download of the %1$s update failed. If this error occurs frequently, click here to view the error report.
Shows when app updates are downloaded in the background.
Notification about downloads in the background
Notification channel for warnings about outdated apps.
You have outdated apps which should not be used anymore. Click for more information.
Show errors of the background update checker

Firefox Browser for Android is automatically private and incredibly fast. Thousands of online trackers are following you every day, collecting information about where you go online and slowing down your speed. Firefox blocks over 2000 of these trackers by default and there are ad blocker add-ons available if you want to customize your browser even more. With Firefox, youâ€™ll get the security you deserve and the speed you need in a private, mobile browser.
- This app is designed for developers and testers. It may contain various bugs that can affect your usual work with the browser.
This is a modification of the Firefox browser aimed to increase privacy.

Firefox Klar is developed for Germany, Austria and Switzerland, but can be used by users in any country. It is very similar to Firefox Focus, but the name was changed in German-speaking countries to avoid confusion with the magazine Focus by Hubert Burda Media group. Unlike Firefox Focus, Firefox Klar has telemetry disabled by default due to strict German privacy laws.

Please note that this app used to be titled Firefox Preview. It has now been transitioned to Firefox Nightly. 

Firefox Nightly is a developmental channel for new Mozilla Firefox releases. 

Firefox Nightly is designed to showcase the more experimental builds of Firefox. The Nightly channel allows users to experience the newest Firefox innovations in an unstable environment and provide feedback on features and performance to help determine what makes the final release.
- This app is designed for developers and testers. It may contain various bugs that can affect your usual work with the browser.

Firefox Browser for Android is automatically private and incredibly fast. Thousands of online trackers are following you every day, collecting information about where you go online and slowing down your speed. Firefox blocks over 2000 of these trackers by default and there are ad blocker add-ons available if you want to customize your browser even more. With Firefox, youâ€™ll get the security you deserve and the speed you need in a private, mobile browser.
- An improved version of Firefox is also available on F-Droid under the name "Fennec F-Droid".
The browser has not been updated for a long time, so I recommend using another browser temporarily. When the developers release a new update, I will remove this warning.

Definitely not brought to you by Mozilla! 

Iceraven Browser is a web browser for Android, based on Mozilla's Fenix version of Firefox, GeckoView and Mozilla Android Components. 

Our goal is to be a close fork of the new Firefox for Android that seeks to provide users with more options, more opportunities to customize (including a broad extension library), and more information about the pages they visit and how their browsers are interacting with those pages.
- The maintainer gives no warranties or guarantees of security or updates or even stability.\n - The project takes longer than usual to provide security updates.

This is an updater for privacy-friendly browsers. Click the plus button to install new apps. Swipe down to force a check for new updates. By default, the app will periodically check for updates in the background, which will then be downloaded and eventually installed. Click the gear to customize the behavior in the settings. \n \nLast successful background update check: %1$s
If you think that FFUpdater has cached a faulty app update or if you want to save space, click the button to delete the downloaded file.
If the installation fails frequently, try switching to the \'native installer\' in the settings.
External storage is not available - can\'t start download. Current status is:
Can\'t expose file path to other apps. Please open the folder yourself with your preferred file manager."
GitHub-API rate limit is exceeded. Please try the download again in the next hour.
You can open the cache folder to copy the APK file to a place with more free storage. Unfortunately, on Android 11+ only few file managers can access this folder within Android/data.
A temporary network issue occurred. Please retry later.
Your device is low on storage (only %1$d MB free). This will lead to download or installation failure.
You can now close this window
The latest version of this app is already installed. Do you want to download and install the latest version again?
App has been updated in the background.

The operation likely failed because of storage issues. For example, the device may be running low on space, or external media may be unavailable. The user may be able to help free space or insert different external media.
Kiwi Browser is made to browse the internet, read news, watch videos and listen to music, without annoyances.

- Kiwi uses the technical foundation of Google Chrome and thus indirectly supports the monopoly position of the Chromium render engine. 
- Kiwi is not an ideal privacy browser but has a good addon support. 
- The browser is getting paid by search engines for every search done using Kiwi Browser. Depending on the search engine choice, requests may go via Kiwibrowser / Kiwisearchservices servers. 
- Google Ads in Kiwi may use the location data for ads - but you can disable it by disabling the Discovery feature. But this will soon change. See https://privacy.kiwibrowser.org/ for more details.
PASSWORD ACCESS FOR YOU, & ONLY YOU \n \nSecurely track your Firefox passwords & access them anywhere. Quickly open any website from the app to get into your accounts.
Mozilla dropped the support in December 2021. Please switch to another password safe.

FFUpdater caches already downloaded app updates and stores them in the 'Android/data/de.marmaro.krt.ffupdater/files/Download' folder.

This saves bandwidth when an app is not successfully installed or updated. Also, the cache is needed so that updates that were downloaded in the background can be installed later.

If you decide to delete these app updates, you may have to download them again.
FFUpdater is missing the permission to install and update apps. You have to grant these permissions or FFUpdater will not work.
The app is downloading updates in the background now. Do you want to start a new download that may take longer?
The operation failed because not enough storage is available: %1$s
Require user interaction. You must first update the app via the FFUpdater user interface. Only then are silent background updates for the respective app allowed.
The operation failed in a generic way. The system will always try to provide a more specific failure reason, but in some rare cases this may be delivered.
The operation failed because it was actively aborted. For example, the user actively declined requested permissions, or the session was abandoned.

The operation failed because it was blocked. For example, a device policy may be blocking the operation, a package verifier may have blocked the operation, or the app may be required for core system operation.

The operation failed because it conflicts (or is inconsistent with) with another package already installed on the device. For example, an existing permission, incompatible certificates, etc. The user may be able to uninstall another app to fix the issue.

The operation failed because it is fundamentally incompatible with this device. For example, the app may require a hardware feature that doesn\'t exist, it may be missing native code for the ABIs supported by the device, or it requires a newer SDK version, etc.
The operation failed because one or more of the APKs was invalid. For example, they might be malformed, corrupt, incorrectly signed, mismatched, etc.

The operation failed because of storage issues. For example, the device may be running low on space, or external media may be unavailable. The user may be able to help free space or insert different external media.
Delete the downloaded update if the installation fails.
Delete the downloaded update if the installation is successful.
When an update is detected, download it. This will later speed up the update process.
Not recommended for users with limited mobile data.
Download app updates on metered networks
Try to install updates without user interaction.
Check for new updates at regular intervals.
Useful if you don\'t want to update an app and don\'t want to receive update notifications for it.
Settings when the app is working in the background and is invisible to the user.
Hide the warning button for installed app.
Choose between light and dark theme
Allow update checks on metered networks such as mobile data.
Settings when the user interface is visible.
Fallback if the session installer does not work on your smartphone. This is more often the case with devices from Samsung or Xiaomi.
Uses root permission to install or update apps without user interaction. This requires a rooted smartphone.

Google Chromium, sans integration with Google.\n\nWithout signing in to a Google Account, Chromium does pretty well in terms of security and privacy. However, Chromium still has some dependency on Google web services and binaries. In addition, Google designed Chromium to be easy and intuitive for users, which means they compromise on transparency and control of internal operations.
- Ungoogled Chromium uses the technical foundation of Google Chrome and thus indirectly supports the monopoly position of the Chromium render engine.
The selected browser is incompatible with your smartphone\'s processor. Please select a different browser.

Discover a blazingly fast Internet browser! Vivaldi is a new, free, and private web browser built with flexibility in mind. It comes packed with useful features including a built-in AdBlocker (pop-up blocker), tracking protection, and private translation. Browser options like proper desktop-style tabs, dark/light Themes, and layout choices help you make it yours.
- Vivaldi is only partially open source.\n- It also uses the technical foundation of Google Chrome and thus indirectly supports the monopoly position of the Chromium render engine.

This is a privacy oriented and deblobbed web browser based on Mozilla technology. It enables many features upstreamed by the Tor Uplift project using preferences from the arkenfox-user.js project. It is recommended to install \'uBlock Origin\'.
FFUpdater downloads the files from the F-Droid servers and is therefore not faster.
Notification channel for warning that no background update check was successful in the last five days.
No successful background update check for five days

In the last five days FFUpdater was not able to check for updates in the background. If you had your smartphone in flight mode for a long time, you can ignore this message. If not, click here to view the error report.

"The developer posted: \"I won't be able to update the versions for some time. If possible please use one of the browsers [that FFUpdater supports] in the meantime.\" https://github.com/ungoogled-software/ungoogled-chromium-android/issues/123"
Tor Browser for Android is the only official mobile browser supported by the Tor Project, developers of the worldâ€™s strongest tool for privacy and freedom online.

Orbot is a free proxy app that empowers other apps to use the internet more securely. Orbot uses Tor to encrypt your Internet traffic and then hides it by bouncing through a series of computers around the world. Tor is free software and an open network that helps you defend against a form of network surveillance that threatens personal freedom and privacy, confidential business activities and relationships, and state security known as traffic analysis.
